title: Fat serif from one of the last issues of Emigre magazine
author: sanderpe

comments.content:
Surprise!  
It's a font sold by Emigre.  
 [Los Feliz](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016121820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/los-feliz/), designed by Christian Schwartz.  
Don
Thanks, I was expecting it to be by Emigre (not sure if the magazine was ever set in the typefaces of other foundries?), but they have a pretty extensive catalog.
